name: Dao Duck Goose
description:
A wuxia waterfowl fighting game.

Dao Duck Goose is my final project for a class I took at Georgia Tech. We had to make a GBA game in about a month.

Controls in Game:

  • A: Ranged slash
  • B: Close slash
  • Arrow Buttons: Change target 
  • Start: Pause

All code and art by me. Music is by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) and me.
